segments.text: How frustrating ! The bus is still not coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ma'am , take your kid to school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I am in a hurry . Please take a shortcut .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Don't worry , the taxi is faster than the bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The traffic is terrible on Monday morning . It takes us almost 1 hour to get to school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My son is the same . But he always makes an early start in the morning , and enjoys listening to the English programmer Let's talk in English on the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's wonderful . He is killing two birds with one stone.Sir , please turn right at the next corner . And stop at the taxi stand .
segments.speaker: S1
